entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:48 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-la-Madeleine 08:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: S 44 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to a few flurries this morning and ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 30 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:19 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 06:19 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
